org.apache.taverna.platform.report

Class ProcessorReport

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.platform.report.StatusReport<Processor,WorkflowReport>
      • org.apache.taverna.platform.report.ProcessorReport
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocalProcessorReport

    public class ProcessorReport
extends StatusReport<Processor,WorkflowReport>
    Report about the State of a Processor invocation.
    Author:
    David Withers, Stian Soiland-Reyes
